description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Simple RTS where the goal is to destroy the other hives of robotic beetles by spawning a hive of your own. Witness the hive mind as each beetle relays messages through the colony to accomplish your goals. One of five DreamBuildPlay 2008: Silicon Minds Warm Up Challenge winners.
